import React, { Fragment,useState } from 'react' import { NavLink } from 'react-router-dom' import { useLocation } from 'react-router-dom' export default function ChatUI({ title, onDelete,params }) { const location = useLocation() console.log("PARAMS : ",location.params) const [friendGroup, setfriendGroup] = useState(location.params) return (
Back

{friendGroup.friend}

{/* CHAT COMPONENT */}
Send
) }
